article_title: John Kasich broke with the GOP on health care, and he’d do it again
article_text:
His faith, honed by tragedy, tells him to care for the poor

But he has also restricted food-stamp access and slashed education funding

Personal energy belies his campaign debate image

article_metadata.news-keywords: Kasich, John Kasich, GOP, Republican, president, presidential, primary, primaries, election, health care, Obamacare, Affordable Care Act, Medicaid, Ohio, Obama
article_metadata.description: Outside the Hilton on a glorious morning, John Kasich pulls his buddies into a huddle so tight their temples touch. “Lord,” he begins, and then he gives thanks. He wants his men to be proud of this campaign, he says. He wants to raise the bar.
article_metadata.title: John Kasich broke with the GOP on health care, and he’d do it again | News & Observer
